name: Psychic Trial
description:
Ỉ̵̞͑t̶̘͗̇'̷̠́͋͜ŝ̴̺̋ ̴̲̋͗n̴͔͎̏ö̷̻́t̸̢͖̋̔ ̷͍̯̇͘r̵͈̽̅ë̵͎́͑a̴̩̯͋̉l̴̰͊,̸̫̉ ̷̯͇͂i̸̭̰̋s̴͍̍͜i̵͍̔͘ṭ̷̇?̸̥͖̐

Í̶̮ ̴̆̓ͅm̵̦͙̐u̸̻̍͝s̴͔̲̎t̵̩̽́ ̵̡̗̀h̶͓̐ì̵͈͋d̸̈́͂͜é̵̱͋ ̷͓̘̑̀ö̷͕̚ŗ̸͍̃́ ̴̫̀d̷̼͖͌͐e̸͇̩͛f̸͓̞̍e̴̟̹͒͝ä̶̰̺́t̷̤̂́ ̴̡͖̿͠i̶͔̇t̷̉͜

Controls

Move - WSAD + Mouse
Shoot rifle - left click
Shoot shotgun - left double click
m̵̞̮̈́̈́ā̷͖k̶̨͓̚e̸͖̜̾̆ ̶̘̓i̸̘̮̔̐t̶͍͐͝ ̸͈̈́̈n̵̮͑̉o̸̭̙̍͛ṯ̶̩̓̀ ̵͉͊́r̶̹͐ě̵̛̼a̴̻̋̈l̴̮̳͐ - Space

Credits (not all used)

PS: My high score is 214 without exploitive strategies. Take that as a challenge.
